szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.intrfc.misc

Interface GameRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGameRenderer, ActorRenderer, BackgroundRenderer, FinalScoreRenderer, PlayerRenderer, TunnelsRenderer, WeaponRenderer

    public interface GameRenderer
    Created by developer on 24.1.2017. Interface for all helper classes used to render specific aspects of the game, e.g. players, score, actors, tunnels, etc.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Called when the application ends to release any resources.
      void render()
      Renders a particular aspect of the game.
      void reset(GameLevelPrivileged game)
      Called when the game level changes to update any level-specific cached member variables stored in the updater object.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render()
        Renders a particular aspect of the game.

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Called when the application ends to release any resources.

      • reset

        void reset(GameLevelPrivileged game)
        Called when the game level changes to update any level-specific cached member variables stored in the updater object.
        Parameters:
        game - the new game level
